name: Memory Match (NathanWhitehead)
description:
The first game in a series of games made in one week!

This is Memory Match! You are a matcher and must defeat many foes to get to the end and be crowned master matcher! In this game you will have to find pairs to match and deal damage to foes in your way. Failing a match opens you up to taking damage yourself.

Upon defeating a foe, you will have options to help you survive your journey to level 20.

Stats like time taken to play and match percentage are here for those who like speedrunning or being perfectionists!

I hope you enjoy the game :)

If you want to find more games I make, or stay updated on more one week games please follow my instagram here Nate Whitehead (@1weekgames) • Instagram photos and videos and my youtube here 1 Week Games - YouTube
